item.title: The p word
item.author: Rahul
item.description: So, a group of 124 prominent researchers in the field of consciousness published a one-page preprint titled The Integrated Information Theory of Consciousness as Pseudoscience to express their concerns about the media hype of Integrated Information Theory (IIT), and a heated discussion ensued on Twitter. This is a collection of threads that would be valuable for anyone interested in gathering well-rounded opinions around this preprint. I’m hoping that the flame wars will encourage researchers to rethink their approaches
